title: Peanut-Chocolate Balls
description: Rich, chocolatey, and deeply satisfying — a homemade treat with simple ingredients.
instructions: Dry roast peanuts until aromatic. Cool completely. Crush coarsely. Keep 1 to 2 tbsp aside.
Paste the dates. Add Oats, Cocoa powder, Oil, Salt & vanilla. Mix until a thick, sticky dough forms. Add the crushed peanuts.
Take 1 level tablespoon mixture per ball. Roll into smooth balls. Refrigerate for 15–20 minutes.
Heat water in a pan until hot (not boiling). Place chocolate in a heat‑safe bowl over the pan. Add oil and stir gently until smooth and glossy. Add reserved peanuts.
Dip chilled balls into melted chocolate. Place on a plate or parchment. Refrigerate 15 minutes until set.
